title: Warpwright card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a heavily engraved door swinging open. The landscape beyond appears upside down.}} The Warpwright card attempts to place a teleport trap near the player. It is completely ineffective in the Abyss. It is often better than a [[Scroll of teleportation]] in an emergency because the player can step on the trap for an instant getaway, rather than waiting for the scroll to trigger.
